ygData.msgSnippet: Actually Shada, at L50 you can mass fear away the secondary target, and even if it runs away screaming it s head off for help, everything else ignores it
ygData.messageBody:
Actually Shada, at L50 you can mass fear away the secondary target, and
even if it runs away screaming it's head off for help, everything else
ignores it because they all con green. ;P

However, (there's always a however), I know that there are a couple
spots where the monsters, regardless of level, will aggro to help a
feared monster. None of those in MM are near the Butler and Maid though.
:)

Ariell Thunderwolf, Karana

P.S. I have killed so many of Mayong's pals that I am KOS, even in Wolf
Form hehe.

> all my time there was spent at level 50 going after wakazishis (except for
> the 3 trips, 3 deaths between 30 to 40 which made me avoid the place), and i
> was with a level 50 druid so i did not solo. just for the sake of argument
> though... could you not invis the entire way to the butler's room? and once
> there, charm the gargoyle in the room to attack the butler, then finish off
> the winner? i suppose the surrounding rooms and hall spawns would come
> running, but just a thought.
>
> Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
> Tyria Sarkin, L31 High Elf Wizard
> Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
> Mithaniel Marr Server
